あ.name: A
あ.description: A basic vowel sound, pronounced like 'ah' in 'father'.

で.name: De
で.description: Voiced consonant-vowel syllable formed from 'て' with dakuten.

い.name: I
い.description: A basic vowel sound, pronounced like 'ee' in 'see'.

う.name: U
う.description: A basic vowel sound, pronounced like 'oo' in 'food', with lips less rounded.

え.name: E
え.description: A basic vowel sound, pronounced like 'e' in 'bet'.

お.name: O
お.description: A basic vowel sound, pronounced like 'o' in 'more', with lips less rounded.

か.name: Ka
か.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless velar plosive followed by 'a'.

き.name: Ki
き.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless velar plosive followed by 'i'.

く.name: Ku
く.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless velar plosive followed by 'u'.

け.name: Ke
け.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless velar plosive followed by 'e'.

こ.name: Ko
こ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless velar plosive followed by 'o'.

さ.name: Sa
さ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolar fricative followed by 'a'.

し.name: Shi
し.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolo-palatal fricative followed by 'i'.

す.name: Su
す.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolar fricative followed by 'u'.

せ.name: Se
せ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolar fricative followed by 'e'.

そ.name: So
そ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolar fricative followed by 'o'.

た.name: Ta
た.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolar plosive followed by 'a'.

ち.name: Chi
ち.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolo-palatal affricate followed by 'i'.

つ.name: Tsu
つ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolar affricate followed by 'u'.

て.name: Te
て.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolar plosive followed by 'e'.

と.name: To
と.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless alveolar plosive followed by 'o'.

な.name: Na
な.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced alveolar nasal followed by 'a'.

に.name: Ni
に.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced alveolar nasal followed by 'i'.

ぬ.name: Nu
ぬ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced alveolar nasal followed by 'u'.

ね.name: Ne
ね.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced alveolar nasal followed by 'e'.

の.name: No
の.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced alveolar nasal followed by 'o'.

は.name: Ha
は.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless glottal fricative followed by 'a'.

ひ.name: Hi
ひ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless palatal fricative followed by 'i'.

ふ.name: Fu
ふ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless bilabial fricative followed by 'u'.

へ.name: He
へ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless glottal fricative followed by 'e'.

ほ.name: Ho
ほ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiceless glottal fricative followed by 'o'.

ま.name: Ma
ま.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced bilabial nasal followed by 'a'.

み.name: Mi
み.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced bilabial nasal followed by 'i'.

む.name: Mu
む.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced bilabial nasal followed by 'u'.

め.name: Me
め.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced bilabial nasal followed by 'e'.

も.name: Mo
も.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced bilabial nasal followed by 'o'.

や.name: Ya
や.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a palatal approximant followed by 'a'.

ゆ.name: Yu
ゆ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a palatal approximant followed by 'u'.

よ.name: Yo
よ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a palatal approximant followed by 'o'.

ら.name: Ra
ら.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with an alveolar tap followed by 'a'.

り.name: Ri
り.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with an alveolar tap followed by 'i'.

る.name: Ru
る.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with an alveolar tap followed by 'u'.

れ.name: Re
れ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with an alveolar tap followed by 'e'.

ろ.name: Ro
ろ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with an alveolar tap followed by 'o'.

わ.name: Wa
わ.description: A consonant-vowel syllable, pronounced with a voiced labio-velar approximant followed by 'a'.

を.name: Wo
を.description: Primarily used as a particle, pronounced 'o', represents the direct object marker in Japanese.

ん.name: N
ん.description: A nasal sound, pronounced as 'n', the only standalone consonant in hiragana.
